task.summary: Default task
first commit, commit all Laravel files
create master migration model for Email table
add fields for the email table
commit updates on some main files
add Email model
add a file using faker to create a few records to the Email table
configure EmailTableSeeder to add some records to database
create EmailController
create a initial component to sending email by external services including an interface, master main class, and the classes for each external service
implementing send email to Sendgrid
remove components folder and new folder is called 'Classes' to the classess of Email services
send email bu Sendergrid
create SendEmailJob class to implement Queue,
push emails to a queue
change name of SendEmail to SendEmailJob
Add a layout including : master, head, footer, ...
create a view for show emails
Retrieving the list of emails from API and put in a table
Add a form to send email
add two methods for showing list of emails and sending email including : showall, compose
add two route showall and compose
add section and title to the file compose.blade.php
distract the email frame of other files, and update the compose and table files matching with EmailFrame
send master new email to api in compose.vue
edit tags in emailfram.blade.php
add a new js file to add global functions, function.js
add related files for toast functions
unhidden state variable in Email.php
Add 'From ' column to the table-email in Email.php
Add validation and parsing
confirm all files
Add another email service(Sparkpost) for fallback,
add a class for test API : 'EmailAPiTes'
Add test command to composer.json
customizing error response
add two files in resource to customize API response
edit fields of EmailResource
add result to ResponseObject
create fake data to test with EmailFactory
remove create_at filed from hidden field
add result field to the response class
edit fields based the new API files in TableEMail.vue
add a view for show detail of each email
change default messasge variable in the ResponseObject class
